description: A basic chestplate made of iron.
name: Iron Chestplate

description: A sharp knife ideal for cutting and peeling vegetables.
name: Paring Knife

description: Used to cast spells forgotten to time. Only a select few have succesfully been able to cast them.
name: Glintstone Staff

description: Refreshing and berry-flavored, one sip relaxes your entire body and takes you to the beach on a hot summer day.
name: Tropical Smoothie

description: Health supplies to bring with you on the go. Includes bandages and food.
name: First-Aid Kit

description: The very ingredient that gives bakeries business. Too much, however, can be detrimental.
name: Pure Vanilla Extract

description: Extremely fast rotating knives meant to be put in a blender. No one knows who took them out.
name: Blender Knives

description: Disappear among the sea of butterflies, Illusions of the past!
name: Butterfly Flurry

description: Coffee made from the most delicious of espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam. Drinking it makes you feel incredibly hyper.
name: Cappuccino

description: Contains colors the naked eye is unable to see. However, holding it gives the eye the ability to see these unusual colors.
name: Color Palette

description: A tempting purchase on a hot day.
name: Cooling Fan

description: Hot tea made from water, honey, and a lemon.
name: Honey Tea

description: Expensive matcha imports results in this heavenly drink.
name: Iced Matcha Latte

description: Only able to be carried by the strongest of men.
name: Incredibly Heavy Metal Shield

description: A basic sword made of iron.
name: Iron Sword

description: A chest of Vitamin C tablets. You can overcome any disease that comes your away with this.
name: Large Vitamin C

description: Holding it gives you the feeling of some otherworldly energy
name: Magic Wand

description: A package of Vitamin C tablets. One tablet a day keeps the bad fruits away.
name: Medium Vitamin C

description: One spray will make you smell like oranges for at least 2 days.
name: Orange Scented Perfume

description: The shell of a peanut who passed away in battle eons ago.
name: Peanut Shell

description: A place for you to sit down when you're vulnurable after a long day of work.
name: Plush Chair

description: A purple plume that reminds you of a certain underworld dweller.
name: Purple Quill

description: A bottle of Vitamin C tablets. Makes your immune system stronger.
name: Small Vitamin C

description: Comes in three different flavors. Drinking it takes you to the land of dreams.
name: SoulGlad

description: Although bitter, eating it makes you feel stronger
name: Spinach Pack

description: A throwable hand grenade that explodes with orange juice and leaves a cloud of the zest behind.
name: Zest Grenade
